SOURCE CODE 

0001 function matrix2latex(matrix, filename, varargin)
0002 
0003 % function: matrix2latex(...)
0004 % Author:   M. Koehler
0005 % Contact:  koehler@in.tum.de
0006 % Version:  1.1
0007 % Date:     May 09, 2004
0008 
0009 % This software is published under the GNU GPL, by the free software
0010 % foundation. For further reading see: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/licenses.html#GPL
0011 
0012 % Usage:
0013 % matrix2late(matrix, filename, varargs)
0014 % where
0015 %   - matrix is a 2 dimensional numerical or cell array
0016 %   - filename is a valid filename, in which the resulting latex code will
0017 %   be stored
0018 %   - varargs is one ore more of the following (denominator, value) combinations
0019 %      + 'rowLabels', array -> Can be used to label the rows of the
0020 %      resulting latex table
0021 %      + 'columnLabels', array -> Can be used to label the columns of the
0022 %      resulting latex table
0023 %      + 'alignment', 'value' -> Can be used to specify the alginment of
0024 %      the table within the latex document. Valid arguments are: 'l', 'c',
0025 %      and 'r' for left, center, and right, respectively
0026 %      + 'format', 'value' -> Can be used to format the input data. 'value'
0027 %      has to be a valid format string, similar to the ones used in
0028 %      fprintf('format', value);
0029 %      + 'size', 'value' -> One of latex' recognized font-sizes, e.g. tiny,
0030 %      HUGE, Large, large, LARGE, etc.
0031 %
0032 % Example input:
0033 %   matrix = [1.5 1.764; 3.523 0.2];
0034 %   rowLabels = {'row 1', 'row 2'};
0035 %   columnLabels = {'col 1', 'col 2'};
0036 %   matrix2latex(matrix, 'out.tex', 'rowLabels', rowLabels, 'columnLabels', columnLabels, 'alignment', 'c', 'format', '%-6.2f', 'size', 'tiny');
0037 %
0038 % The resulting latex file can be included into any latex document by:
0039 % /input{out.tex}
0040 %
0041 % Enjoy life!!!
0042 
0043     rowLabels = [];
0044     colLabels = [];
0045     alignment = 'l';
0046     format = [];
0047     textsize = [];
0048     if (rem(nargin,2) == 1 || nargin < 2)
0049         error('matrix2latex: ', 'Incorrect number of arguments to %s.', mfilename);
0050     end
0051 
0052     okargs = {'rowlabels','columnlabels', 'alignment', 'format', 'size'};
0053     for j=1:2:(nargin-2)
0054         pname = varargin{j};
0055         pval = varargin{j+1};
0056         k = strmatch(lower(pname), okargs);
0057         if isempty(k)
0058             error('matrix2latex: ', 'Unknown parameter name: %s.', pname);
0059         elseif length(k)>1
0060             error('matrix2latex: ', 'Ambiguous parameter name: %s.', pname);
0061         else
0062             switch(k)
0063                 case 1  % rowlabels
0064                     rowLabels = pval;
0065                     if isnumeric(rowLabels)
0066                         rowLabels = cellstr(num2str(rowLabels(:)));
0067                     end
0068                 case 2  % column labels
0069                     colLabels = pval;
0070                     if isnumeric(colLabels)
0071                         colLabels = cellstr(num2str(colLabels(:)));
0072                     end
0073                 case 3  % alignment
0074                     alignment = lower(pval);
0075                     if alignment == 'right'
0076                         alignment = 'r';
0077                     end
0078                     if alignment == 'left'
0079                         alignment = 'l';
0080                     end
0081                     if alignment == 'center'
0082                         alignment = 'c';
0083                     end
0084                     if alignment ~= 'l' && alignment ~= 'c' && alignment ~= 'r'
0085                         alignment = 'l';
0086                         warning('matrix2latex: ', 'Unkown alignment. (Set it to \''left\''.)');
0087                     end
0088                 case 4  % format
0089                     format = lower(pval);
0090                 case 5  % format
0091                     textsize = pval;
0092             end
0093         end
0094     end
0095 
0096     fid = fopen(filename, 'w');
0097     
0098     width = size(matrix, 2);
0099     height = size(matrix, 1);
0100 
0101     if isnumeric(matrix)
0102         matrix = num2cell(matrix);
0103         for h=1:height
0104             for w=1:width
0105                 if(~isempty(format))
0106                     matrix{h, w} = num2str(matrix{h, w}, format);
0107                 else
0108                     matrix{h, w} = num2str(matrix{h, w});
0109                 end
0110             end
0111         end
0112     end
0113     
0114     if(~isempty(textsize))
0115         fprintf(fid, '\\begin{%s}', textsize);
0116     end
0117 
0118     fprintf(fid, '\\begin{tabular}{|');
0119 
0120     if(~isempty(rowLabels))
0121         fprintf(fid, 'l|');
0122     end
0123     for i=1:width
0124         fprintf(fid, '%c|', alignment);
0125     end
0126     fprintf(fid, '}\r\n');
0127     
0128     fprintf(fid, '\\hline\r\n');
0129     
0130     if(~isempty(colLabels))
0131         if(~isempty(rowLabels))
0132             fprintf(fid, '&');
0133         end
0134         for w=1:width-1
0135             fprintf(fid, '\\textbf{%s}&', colLabels{w});
0136         end
0137         fprintf(fid, '\\textbf{%s}\\\\\\hline\r\n', colLabels{width});
0138     end
0139     
0140     for h=1:height
0141         if(~isempty(rowLabels))
0142             fprintf(fid, '\\textbf{%s}&', rowLabels{h});
0143         end
0144         for w=1:width-1
0145             fprintf(fid, '%s&', matrix{h, w});
0146         end
0147         fprintf(fid, '%s\\\\\\hline\r\n', matrix{h, width});
0148     end
0149 
0150     fprintf(fid, '\\end{tabular}\r\n');
0151     
0152     if(~isempty(textsize))
0153         fprintf(fid, '\\end{%s}', textsize);
0154     end
0155 
0156     fclose(fid);
